SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameModelUpdater

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameModelUpdater
public class GameModelUpdater extends Object
One of the tree main classes that manage a game. It receives instructions by the GameFlowManager, and acts on the GameModel, updating it.
See Also:
  • GameFlowManager
  • GameModel

  • Method Details

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(PlayerToken playerToken, Coords coords, int cardId, CardSide cardSide)
      Allows a player to play the given card (and side) at the given coordinates. It updates player elements in case the card placement was successful.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - token of the player playing the card
      coords - coords at which to play the card
      cardId - id of the card to play
      cardSide - side of the card to play
      Returns:
      false if the card cannot be played at that coordinates, true otherwise

    • computeCardsPlayability

      public boolean computeCardsPlayability(PlayerToken playerToken)
      Checks at which coordinates each card in the hand of the player can be placed, and sends him an event with the results.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - token representing the player
      Returns:
      true

    • drawResourceDeckCard

      public boolean drawResourceDeckCard(PlayerToken playerToken)
      Allows a player to draw a ResourceCard card. Draws a card from the ResourceCard deck, and adds it to player's hand
      Parameters:
      playerToken - the token of the player
      Returns:
      false if player's hand is full or deck is empty, true otherwise

    • drawGoldDeckCard

      public boolean drawGoldDeckCard(PlayerToken playerToken)
      Allows a player to draw a GoldCard card. Draws a card from the GoldCard deck, and adds it to player's hand
      Parameters:
      playerToken - the token of the player
      Returns:
      false if player's hand is full or deck is empty, true otherwise

    • drawVisibleResourceCard

      public boolean drawVisibleResourceCard(PlayerToken playerToken, int chosen)
      Allows a player to draw a ResourceCard card. Draws a card from the ResourceCard visible list, and adds it to player's hand.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - the token of the player
      chosen - list index of the card chosen
      Returns:
      false if player's hand is full or deck is empty, true otherwise

    • drawVisibleGoldCard

      public boolean drawVisibleGoldCard(PlayerToken playerToken, int chosen)
      Allows a player to draw a ResourceCard card. Draws a card from the GoldCard visible list, and adds it to player's hand.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - the token of the player
      chosen - the card to draw from visible gold cards (0 or 1)
      Returns:
      true if the action has been completed successfully, false otherwise

    • getSlimGameModel

      public SlimGameModel getSlimGameModel()
      Builds a SlimGameModel to send to a player who just reconnected to the game.
      Returns:
      the SlimGameModel

    • limitScoreReached

      public boolean limitScoreReached()
      Checks whether limit score is reached by any player.
      Returns:
      true if any player has reached limit score, false otherwise

    • anyDeckEmpty

      public boolean anyDeckEmpty()
      Checks whether one of the two decks is empty.
      Returns:
      true if one of the two decks is empty, false otherwise
